PLAYER HEIGHT WEIGHT DOB PLACE OF BIRTH 32 Mathieu Garon 6' 1" 206 Jan 9, 1978 Chandler, QC, CAN 30 Dwayne Roloson 6' 1" 170 Oct 12, 1969 Simcoe, ON, CAN LIGHTNING STATS: Quote: http://lightning.nhl.com/club/stats.htm FLYERS vs. LIGHTNING SERIES' HISTORY: Current and Miscellaneous: The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season record is 40-25-8-2 with wins in six of the last nine games. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season home record is 18-10-7-2 with a two-game losing streak. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season road record is 22-15-1-0 with wins in four of the last five games. The Flyers are 7-6 in 13 PO games, 4-2 at home and 3-4 away. The Flyers won in 1996 (4-2) and lost in 2004 (3-4).
